response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a fair and advantageous deal considering the product's worth to you and my desire to ensure it reaches the right hands. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
